verses.verse: וְאֵ֣לֶּה ׀ <WH428> now these בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> Now these [are] the children הַמְּדִינָ֗ה <WH4082> of the province הָֽעֹלִים֙ <WH5927> that went up מִשְּׁבִ֣י <WH7628> out of the captivity הַגּוֹלָ֔ה <WH1473> of those which had been carried away אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> whom הֶגְלָ֛ה <WH1540> had carried away [נְבוּכַדְנֶצֹּור כ] (נְבוּכַדְנֶצַּ֥ר <WH5020> Nebuchadnezzar ק) מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> the king בָּבֶ֖ל <WH894> of Babylon לְבָבֶ֑ל <WH894> unto Babylon וַיָּשׁ֛וּבוּ <WH7725> and came again לִירוּשָׁלִַ֥ם <WH3389> unto Jerusalem וִֽיהוּדָ֖ה <WH3063> and Judah אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> every one לְעִירֽוֹ׃ <WH5892> unto his city

אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> These בָּ֣אוּ <WH935> Which came עִם־ <WH5973> with זְרֻבָּבֶ֗ל <WH2216> with Zerubbabel יֵשׁ֡וּעַ <WH3442> Jeshua נְ֠חֶמְיָה <WH5166> Nehemiah שְׂרָיָ֨ה <WH8304> Seraiah רְֽעֵלָיָ֜ה <WH7480> Reelaiah מָרְדֳּכַ֥י <WH4782> Mordecai בִּלְשָׁ֛ן <WH1114> Bilshan מִסְפָּ֥ר <WH4558> Mispar בִּגְוַ֖י <WH902> Bigvai רְח֣וּם <WH7348> Rehum בַּעֲנָ֑ה <WH1196> Baanah מִסְפַּ֕ר <WH4557> The number אַנְשֵׁ֖י <WH376> of the men עַ֥ם <WH5971> of the people יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel ס
בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> The children פַרְעֹ֔שׁ <WH6551> of Parosh אַלְפַּ֕יִם <WH505> two thousand מֵאָ֖ה <WH3967> an hundred שִׁבְעִ֥ים <WH7657> seventy וּשְׁנָֽיִם׃ <WH8147> and two ס
בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> The children שְׁפַטְיָ֔ה <WH8203> of Shephatiah שְׁלֹ֥שׁ <WH7969> three מֵא֖וֹת <WH3967> hundred שִׁבְעִ֥ים <WH7657> seventy וּשְׁנָֽיִם׃ <WH8147> and two ס
בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> The children אָרַ֔ח <WH733> of Arah שְׁבַ֥ע <WH7651> seven מֵא֖וֹת <WH3967> hundred חֲמִשָּׁ֥ה <WH2568> and five וְשִׁבְעִֽים׃ <WH7657> seventy ס

בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> The children פַחַ֥ת מוֹאָ֛ב <WH6355> of Pahathmoab לִבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> of the children יֵשׁ֖וּעַ <WH3442> of Jeshua יוֹאָ֑ב <WH3097> [and] Joab אַלְפַּ֕יִם <WH505> two thousand שְׁמֹנֶ֥ה <WH8083> eight מֵא֖וֹת <WH3967> hundred וּשְׁנֵ֥ים <WH8147> both עָשָֽׂר׃ <WH6240> ten ס
בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> The children עֵילָ֔ם <WH5867> of Elam אֶ֕לֶף <WH505> a thousand מָאתַ֖יִם <WH3967> two hundred חֲמִשִּׁ֥ים <WH2572> fifty וְאַרְבָּעָֽה׃ <WH702> and four ס
בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> The children זַתּ֔וּא <WH2240> of Zattu תְּשַׁ֥ע <WH8672> nine מֵא֖וֹת <WH3967> hundred וְאַרְבָּעִ֥ים <WH705> forty וַחֲמִשָּֽׁה׃ <WH2568> and five ס
בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> The children זַכָּ֔י <WH2140> of Zaccai שְׁבַ֥ע <WH7651> seven מֵא֖וֹת <WH3967> hundred וְשִׁשִּֽׁים׃ <WH8346> and threescore ס
בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> The children בָנִ֔י <WH1137> of Bani שֵׁ֥שׁ <WH8337> six מֵא֖וֹת <WH3967> hundred אַרְבָּעִ֥ים <WH705> forty וּשְׁנָֽיִם׃ <WH8147> and two ס
בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> The children בֵבָ֔י <WH893> of Bebai שֵׁ֥שׁ <WH8337> six מֵא֖וֹת <WH3967> hundred עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> twenty וּשְׁלֹשָֽׁה׃ <WH7969> and three ס
בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> The children עַזְגָּ֔ד <WH5803> of Azgad אֶ֕לֶף <WH505> a thousand מָאתַ֖יִם <WH3967> hundred עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> twenty וּשְׁנָֽיִם׃ <WH8147> two ס
בְּנֵי֙ <WH1121> The children אֲדֹ֣נִיקָ֔ם <WH140> of Adonikam שֵׁ֥שׁ <WH8337> six מֵא֖וֹת <WH3967> hundred שִׁשִּׁ֥ים <WH8346> sixty וְשִׁשָּֽׁה׃ <WH8337> and six ס
בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> The children בִגְוָ֔י <WH902> of Bigvai אַלְפַּ֖יִם <WH505> two thousand חֲמִשִּׁ֥ים <WH2572> fifty וְשִׁשָּֽׁה׃ <WH8337> and six ס
בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> The children עָדִ֔ין <WH5720> of Adin אַרְבַּ֥ע <WH702> four מֵא֖וֹת <WH3967> hundred חֲמִשִּׁ֥ים <WH2572> fifty וְאַרְבָּעָֽה׃ <WH702> and four ס
בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> The children אָטֵ֥ר <WH333> of Ater לִֽיחִזְקִיָּ֖ה <WH2396> Hezekiah תִּשְׁעִ֥ים <WH8673> ninety וּשְׁמֹנָֽה׃ <WH8083> and eight ס
בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> The children בֵצָ֔י <WH1209> of Bezai שְׁלֹ֥שׁ <WH7969> three מֵא֖וֹת <WH3967> hundred עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> twenty וּשְׁלֹשָֽׁה׃ <WH7969> and three ס
בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> The children יוֹרָ֔ה <WH3139> of Jorah מֵאָ֖ה <WH3967> an hundred וּשְׁנֵ֥ים <WH8147> both עָשָֽׂר׃ <WH6240> ten ס
בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> The children חָשֻׁ֔ם <WH2828> of Hashum מָאתַ֖יִם <WH3967> two hundred עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> twenty וּשְׁלֹשָֽׁה׃ <WH7969> and three ס
בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> The children גִבָּ֖ר <WH1402> of Gibbar תִּשְׁעִ֥ים <WH8673> ninety וַחֲמִשָּֽׁה׃ <WH2568> and five ס
בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> The children בֵֽית־ לָ֔חֶם <WH1035> of Bethlehem מֵאָ֖ה <WH3967> an hundred עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> twenty וּשְׁלֹשָֽׁה׃ <WH7969> and three ס
אַנְשֵׁ֥י <WH582> The men נְטֹפָ֖ה <WH5199> of Netophah חֲמִשִּׁ֥ים <WH2572> fifty וְשִׁשָּֽׁה׃ <WH8337> and six
אַנְשֵׁ֣י <WH376> of עֲנָת֔וֹת <WH6068> of Anathoth מֵאָ֖ה <WH3967> an hundred עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> twenty וּשְׁמֹנָֽה׃ <WH8083> and eight ס
בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> The children עַזְמָ֖וֶת <WH5820> of Azmaveth אַרְבָּעִ֥ים <WH705> forty וּשְׁנָֽיִם׃ <WH8147> and two ס

בְּנֵ֨י <WH1121> The children קִרְיַ֤ת עָרִים֙ <WH7157> of Kirjatharim כְּפִירָ֣ה <WH3716> Chephirah וּבְאֵר֔וֹת <WH881> and Beeroth שְׁבַ֥ע <WH7651> seven מֵא֖וֹת <WH3967> hundred וְאַרְבָּעִ֥ים <WH705> and forty וּשְׁלֹשָֽׁה׃ <WH7969> and three ס
בְּנֵ֤י <WH1121> The children הָרָמָה֙ <WH7414> of Ramah וָגָ֔בַע <WH1387> and Gaba שֵׁ֥שׁ <WH8337> six מֵא֖וֹת <WH3967> hundred עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> twenty וְאֶחָֽד׃ <WH259> and one ס
אַנְשֵׁ֣י <WH376> of מִכְמָ֔ס <WH4363> of Michmas מֵאָ֖ה <WH3967> an hundred עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> twenty וּשְׁנָֽיִם׃ <WH8147> and two ס
אַנְשֵׁ֤י <WH376> he בֵֽית־ אֵל֙ <WH1008> of Bethel וְהָעָ֔י <WH5857> and Ai מָאתַ֖יִם <WH3967> two hundred עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> twenty וּשְׁלֹשָֽׁה׃ <WH7969> and three ס
בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> The children נְב֖וֹ <WH5015> of Nebo חֲמִשִּׁ֥ים <WH2572> fifty וּשְׁנָֽיִם׃ <WH8147> and two ס
בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> The children מַגְבִּ֔ישׁ <WH4019> of Magbish מֵאָ֖ה <WH3967> an hundred חֲמִשִּׁ֥ים <WH2572> fifty וְשִׁשָּֽׁה׃ <WH8337> and six ס
בְּנֵי֙ <WH1121> The children עֵילָ֣ם <WH5867> Elam אַחֵ֔ר <WH312> of the other אֶ֕לֶף <WH505> a thousand מָאתַ֖יִם <WH3967> two hundred חֲמִשִּׁ֥ים <WH2572> fifty וְאַרְבָּעָֽה׃ <WH702> and four ס
בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> The children חָרִ֔ם <WH2766> of Harim שְׁלֹ֥שׁ <WH7969> three מֵא֖וֹת <WH3967> hundred וְעֶשְׂרִֽים׃ <WH6242> and twenty ס

בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> The children לֹד֙ <WH3850> of Lod חָדִ֣יד <WH2307> Hadid וְאוֹנ֔וֹ <WH207> and Ono שְׁבַ֥ע <WH7651> seven מֵא֖וֹת <WH3967> hundred עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> twenty וַחֲמִשָּֽׁה׃ <WH2568> and five ס
בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> The children יְרֵח֔וֹ <WH3405> of Jericho שְׁלֹ֥שׁ <WH7969> three מֵא֖וֹת <WH3967> hundred אַרְבָּעִ֥ים <WH705> forty וַחֲמִשָּֽׁה׃ <WH2568> and five ס
בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> The children סְנָאָ֔ה <WH5570> of Senaah שְׁלֹ֣שֶׁת <WH7969> three אֲלָפִ֔ים <WH505> thousand וְשֵׁ֥שׁ <WH8337> and six מֵא֖וֹת <WH3967> hundred וּשְׁלֹשִֽׁים׃ <WH7970> and thirty ס

הַֽכֹּהֲנִ֑ים <WH3548> The priests בְּנֵ֤י <WH1121> the children יְדַֽעְיָה֙ <WH3048> of Jedaiah לְבֵ֣ית <WH1004> of the house יֵשׁ֔וּעַ <WH3442> of Jeshua תְּשַׁ֥ע <WH8672> nine מֵא֖וֹת <WH3967> hundred שִׁבְעִ֥ים <WH7657> seventy וּשְׁלֹשָֽׁה׃ <WH7969> and three ס
בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> The children אִמֵּ֔ר <WH564> of Immer אֶ֖לֶף <WH505> a thousand חֲמִשִּׁ֥ים <WH2572> fifty וּשְׁנָֽיִם׃ <WH8147> and two ס
בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> The children פַשְׁח֔וּר <WH6583> of Pashur אֶ֕לֶף <WH505> a thousand מָאתַ֖יִם <WH3967> two hundred אַרְבָּעִ֥ים <WH705> forty וְשִׁבְעָֽה׃ <WH7651> and seven ס
בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> The children חָרִ֔ם <WH2766> of Harim אֶ֖לֶף <WH505> a thousand וְשִׁבְעָ֥ה <WH7651> seven עָשָֽׂר׃ <WH6240> teen ס

הַלְוִיִּ֑ם <WH3881> The Levites בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> the children יֵשׁ֧וּעַ <WH3442> of Jeshua וְקַדְמִיאֵ֛ל <WH6934> and Kadmiel לִבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> of the children הוֹדַוְיָ֖ה <WH1938> of Hodaviah שִׁבְעִ֥ים <WH7657> seventy וְאַרְבָּעָֽה׃ <WH702> and four ס
הַֽמְשֹׁרְרִ֑ים <WH7891> The singers בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> the children אָסָ֔ף <WH623> of Asaph מֵאָ֖ה <WH3967> an hundred עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> twenty וּשְׁמֹנָֽה׃ <WH8083> and eight פ

בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> The children הַשֹּֽׁעֲרִ֗ים <WH7778> of the porters בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> the children שַׁלּ֤וּם <WH7967> of Shallum בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> the children אָטֵר֙ <WH333> of Ater בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> the children טַלְמ֣וֹן <WH2929> of Talmon בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> the children עַקּ֔וּב <WH6126> of Akkub בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> the children חֲטִיטָ֖א <WH2410> of Hatita בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> the children שֹׁבָ֑י <WH7630> of Shobai הַכֹּ֕ל <WH3605> all מֵאָ֖ה <WH3967> [in] all an hundred שְׁלֹשִׁ֥ים <WH7970> thirty וְתִשְׁעָֽה׃ <WH8672> and nine פ

הַנְּתִינִ֑ים <WH5411> The Nethinims בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> the children צִיחָ֥א <WH6727> of Ziha בְנֵי־ <WH1121> the children חֲשׂוּפָ֖א <WH2817> of Hasupha בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> the children טַבָּעֽוֹת׃ <WH2884> of Tabbaoth
בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> The children קֵרֹ֥ס <WH7026> of Keros בְּֽנֵי־ <WH1121> the children סִֽיעֲהָ֖א <WH5517> of Siaha בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> the children פָדֽוֹן׃ <WH6303> of Padon
בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> The children לְבָנָ֥ה <WH3838> of Lebanah בְנֵי־ <WH1121> the children חֲגָבָ֖ה <WH2286> of Hagabah בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> the children עַקּֽוּב׃ <WH6126> of Akkub
בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> The children חָגָ֥ב <WH2285> of Hagab בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> the children [שַׁמְלַי כ] (שַׁלְמַ֖י <WH8014> Shalmai ק) בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> the children חָנָֽן׃ <WH2605> of Hanan
בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> The children גִדֵּ֥ל <WH1435> of Giddel בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> the children גַ֖חַר <WH1515> of Gahar בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> the children רְאָיָֽה׃ <WH7211> of Reaiah
בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> The children רְצִ֥ין <WH7526> of Rezin בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> the children נְקוֹדָ֖א <WH5353> of Nekoda בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> the children גַזָּֽם׃ <WH1502> of Gazzam
בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> The children עֻזָּ֥א <WH5798> of Uzza בְנֵי־ <WH1121> the children פָסֵ֖חַ <WH6454> of Paseah בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> the children בֵסָֽי׃ <WH1153> of Besai

בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> The children אַסְנָ֥ה <WH619> of Asnah בְנֵי־ <WH1121> the children [מְעִינִים כ] (מְעוּנִ֖ים <WH4586> Mehunim ק) בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> the children [נְפִיסִים כ] (נְפוּסִֽים׃ <WH5300> Nephisesim ק)
בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> The children בַקְבּ֥וּק <WH1227> of Bakbuk בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> the children חֲקוּפָ֖א <WH2709> of Hakupha בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> the children חַרְחֽוּר׃ <WH2744> of Harhur
בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> The children בַצְל֥וּת <WH1213> of Bazluth בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> the children מְחִידָ֖א <WH4240> of Mehida בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> the children חַרְשָֽׁא׃ <WH2797> of Harsha
בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> The children בַרְק֥וֹס <WH1302> of Barkos בְּֽנֵי־ <WH1121> the children סִֽיסְרָ֖א <WH5516> of Sisera בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> the children תָֽמַח׃ <WH8547> of Thamah
בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> The children נְצִ֖יחַ <WH5335> of Neziah בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> the children חֲטִיפָֽא׃ <WH2412> of Hatipha

בְּנֵ֖י <WH1121> The children עַבְדֵ֣י <WH5650> servants שְׁלֹמֹ֑ה <WH8010> of Solomon's בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> the children סֹטַ֥י <WH5479> of Sotai בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> the children הַסֹּפֶ֖רֶת <WH5618> of Sophereth בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> the children פְרוּדָֽא׃ <WH6514> of Peruda
בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> The children יַעְלָ֥ה <WH3279> of Jaalah בְנֵי־ <WH1121> the children דַרְק֖וֹן <WH1874> of Darkon בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> the children גִדֵּֽל׃ <WH1435> of Giddel

בְּנֵ֧י <WH1121> The children שְׁפַטְיָ֣ה <WH8203> of Shephatiah בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> the children חַטִּ֗יל <WH2411> of Hattil בְּנֵ֛י <WH1121> the children פֹּכֶ֥רֶת הַצְּבָיִ֖ים <WH6380> of Pochereth of Zebaim בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> the children אָמִֽי׃ <WH532> of Ami

וְאֵ֗לֶּה <WH428> now these הָֽעֹלִים֙ <WH5927> And these [were] they which went up מִתֵּ֥ל מֶ֙לַח֙ <WH8528> from Telmelah תֵּ֣ל חַרְשָׁ֔א <WH8521> Telharsa כְּר֥וּב <WH3743> Cherub אַדָּ֖ן <WH135> Addan אִמֵּ֑ר <WH564> [and] Immer וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> were not יָֽכְל֗וּ <WH3201> but they could לְהַגִּ֤יד <WH5046> not shew בֵּית־ <WH1004> house אֲבוֹתָם֙ <WH1> their father's וְזַרְעָ֔ם <WH2233> and their seed אִ֥ם <WH518> whether מִיִּשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> whether they [were] of Israel הֵֽם׃ <WH1992> like

בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> The children דְלָיָ֥ה <WH1806> of Delaiah בְנֵי־ <WH1121> the children טוֹבִיָּ֖ה <WH2900> of Tobiah בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> the children נְקוֹדָ֑א <WH5353> of Nekoda שֵׁ֥שׁ <WH8337> six מֵא֖וֹת <WH3967> hundred חֲמִשִּׁ֥ים <WH2572> fifty וּשְׁנָֽיִם׃ <WH8147> and two ס

וּמִבְּנֵי֙ <WH1121> And of the children הַכֹּ֣הֲנִ֔ים <WH3548> of the priests בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> the children חֳבַיָּ֖ה <WH2252> of Habaiah בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> the children הַקּ֑וֹץ <WH6976> of Koz בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> the children בַרְזִלַּ֗י <WH1271> of Barzillai אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who לָ֠קַח <WH3947> which took מִבְּנ֞וֹת <WH1323> of the daughters בַּרְזִלַּ֤י <WH1271> of Barzillai הַגִּלְעָדִי֙ <WH1569> the Gileadite אִשָּׁ֔ה <WH802> a wife וַיִּקָּרֵ֖א <WH7121> and was called עַל־ <WH5921> by שְׁמָֽם׃ <WH8034> after their name

אֵ֗לֶּה <WH428> These בִּקְשׁ֧וּ <WH1245> These sought כְתָבָ֛ם <WH3791> their register הַמִּתְיַחְשִׂ֖ים <WH3187> [among] those that were reckoned by genealogy וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> could נִמְצָ֑אוּ <WH4672> but they were not found וַֽיְגֹאֲל֖וּ <WH1351> therefore were they as polluted מִן־ <WH4480> from הַכְּהֻנָּֽה׃ <WH3550> put from the priesthood

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said הַתִּרְשָׁ֙תָא֙ <WH8660> And the Tirshatha לָהֶ֔ם אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> after לֹא־ <WH3808> should not יֹאכְל֖וּ <WH398> unto them that they should not eat מִקֹּ֣דֶשׁ <WH6944> of the most הַקֳּדָשִׁ֑ים <WH6944> holy things עַ֛ד <WH5704> until עֲמֹ֥ד <WH5975> till there stood up כֹּהֵ֖ן <WH3548> a priest לְאוּרִ֥ים <WH224> with Urim וּלְתֻמִּֽים׃ <WH8550> and with Thummim

כָּל־ <WH3605> the whole הַקָּהָ֖ל <WH6951> The whole congregation כְּאֶחָ֑ד <WH259> together אַרְבַּ֣ע <WH702> four רִבּ֔וֹא <WH7239> myriad אַלְפַּ֖יִם <WH505> and two thousand שְׁלֹשׁ־ <WH7969> three מֵא֥וֹת <WH3967> hundred שִׁשִּֽׁים׃ <WH8346> [and] threescore

מִ֠לְּבַד <WH905> beside עַבְדֵיהֶ֤ם <WH5650> Beside their servants וְאַמְהֹֽתֵיהֶם֙ <WH519> and their maids אֵ֔לֶּה <WH428> and [there were] שִׁבְעַ֣ת <WH7651> of whom [there were] seven אֲלָפִ֔ים <WH505> thousand שְׁלֹ֥שׁ <WH7969> three מֵא֖וֹת <WH3967> hundred שְׁלֹשִׁ֣ים <WH7970> thirty וְשִׁבְעָ֑ה <WH7651> and seven וְלָהֶ֛ם מְשֹׁרְרִ֥ים <WH7891> singing men וּֽמְשֹׁרְר֖וֹת <WH7891> and singing women מָאתָֽיִם׃ <WH3967> among them two hundred

סוּסֵיהֶ֕ם <WH5483> Their horses שְׁבַ֥ע <WH7651> [were] seven מֵא֖וֹת <WH3967> hundred שְׁלֹשִׁ֣ים <WH7970> thirty וְשִׁשָּׁ֑ה <WH8337> and six פִּרְדֵיהֶ֕ם <WH6505> their mules מָאתַ֖יִם <WH3967> two hundred אַרְבָּעִ֥ים <WH705> forty וַחֲמִשָּֽׁה׃ <WH2568> and five

גְּמַ֨לֵּיהֶ֔ם <WH1581> Their camels אַרְבַּ֥ע <WH702> four מֵא֖וֹת <WH3967> hundred שְׁלֹשִׁ֣ים <WH7970> thirty וַחֲמִשָּׁ֑ה <WH2568> and five חֲמֹרִ֕ים <WH2543> [their] asses שֵׁ֣שֶׁת <WH8337> six אֲלָפִ֔ים <WH505> thousand שְׁבַ֥ע <WH7651> seven מֵא֖וֹת <WH3967> hundred וְעֶשְׂרִֽים׃ <WH6242> and twenty פ

וּמֵרָאשֵׁי֙ <WH7218> And [some] of the chief הָֽאָב֔וֹת <WH1> of the fathers בְּבוֹאָ֕ם <WH935> when they came לְבֵ֥ית <WH1004> to the house יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which בִּירוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> which [is] at Jerusalem הִֽתְנַדְּבוּ֙ <WH5068> offered freely לְבֵ֣ית <WH1004> for the house הָֽאֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> of God לְהַעֲמִיד֖וֹ <WH5975> to set it up עַל־ <WH5921> and מְכוֹנֽוֹ׃ <WH4349> in his place

כְּכֹחָ֗ם <WH3581> after their ability נָתְנוּ֮ <WH5414> They gave לְאוֹצַ֣ר <WH214> unto the treasure הַמְּלָאכָה֒ <WH4399> of the work זָהָ֗ב <WH2091> of gold דַּרְכְּמוֹנִים֙ <WH1871> drams שֵׁשׁ־ <WH8337> six רִבֹּ֣אות <WH7239> myriad וָאֶ֔לֶף <WH505> and one thousand ס וְכֶ֕סֶף <WH3701> of silver מָנִ֖ים <WH4488> pound חֲמֵ֣שֶׁת <WH2568> and five אֲלָפִ֑ים <WH505> thousand וְכָתְנֹ֥ת <WH3801> garments כֹּהֲנִ֖ים <WH3548> priests' מֵאָֽה׃ <WH3967> and one hundred ס

וַיֵּשְׁב֣וּ <WH3427> dwelt הַכֹּהֲנִ֣ים <WH3548> So the priests וְ֠הַלְוִיִּם <WH3881> and the Levites וּֽמִן־ <WH4480> some הָעָ֞ם <WH5971> and [some] of the people וְהַמְשֹׁרְרִ֧ים <WH7891> and the singers וְהַשּׁוֹעֲרִ֛ים <WH7778> and the porters וְהַנְּתִינִ֖ים <WH5411> and the Nethinims בְּעָרֵיהֶ֑ם <WH5892> in their cities וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> and all Israel בְּעָרֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH5892> in their cities ס
